Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: kenders
Reviews.Content: Just what the doctored ordered.  It fits perfect in the existing basket for the PS3 and was able to continue the game counsel usage.  Better than buying a new PS3!  My family has even commented that games now load faster.

Reviews.Title: Great for upgrading your PS3
Reviews.Author: Shauna
Reviews.Content: Fits perfect in the PS3 and runs noticeably faster! Great drive for the price. Will take awhile to fill this free space up.

Reviews.Title: Just what the doctor ordered for your PS3
Reviews.Author: Juan De La Cruz "injin_outlaw"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this hard drive for the purpose of upgrading the storage capacity on my CECHA01 'fat' PS3; let me tell you, it works like a charm.  So, if you have any concerns about compatibility or functionality for your older model PS3, dismiss them.  The hardware has no problem with recognizing and formatting this drive.  Your PS3 will thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Alexander Ware
Reviews.Content: Took a second to get the PS3 to recognize it, but once it did this baby worked like a dream. Now I can fill it with tons of games from PS Plus!

Reviews.Title: Yes, it fits in your PS4
Reviews.Author: Anthongy
Reviews.Content: If you're wondering if it fits in your PS4. Well, it does. It loads faster also and it's perfect. Good day.

Reviews.Title: Used it as a usb HDD for the Wii U.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Melzak
Reviews.Content: Very nice drive, extremely fast when connected eSata or internally. It was probably overkill as a Wii U drive, but I wanted something that would last and it maxes out the USB connection.

Reviews.Title: Installed in my PS4...
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A. Buffington
Reviews.Content: I ordered this hard drive to replace the stock hard drive in my PS4. So far so good. I like it!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Diaz
Reviews.Content: I got this new hard drive quick and packaged nicely. For my ps3. Works prefectly. Thank you for you business.

Reviews.Title: I'll keep it short and sweet....
Reviews.Author: JBHuskers
Reviews.Content: Got it for my PS4, has worked great right since day one of the system.  Only thing is I'm not sure if there is a backup and restore on PS4 yet if you've already got some saved files, but if you have PS+, those files should be in the cloud anyways.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and tons of space...
Reviews.Author: Scott Burke
Reviews.Content: Bought this drive specifically for the PS3 based upon other reviews for this product.  It was fast and easy to install, and it gives me the space that I needed.

Reviews.Title: Installed on mini itx
Reviews.Author: Mike "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Works beautifully on my Ubuntu Media and samba file server.  Ubuntu recognized the special format on the hard drive without any problems.

Reviews.Title: Works great in my PS3 Slim
Reviews.Author: M. Gage
Reviews.Content: I stuck with a 5400 RPM for the less heat since PS3 heat up enough already!  Works great love it.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Heather Messias
Reviews.Content: I bought a couple of these and so far so good. They're doing just what I expect them to do

Reviews.Title: Works well, no issues.
Reviews.Author: zipturtleaz "zip!"
Reviews.Content: Works well.  I use this in an external enclosure for Archive backups. It is quiet, fast and does the job.

Reviews.Title: Perfect PS3 hard drive
Reviews.Author: Kevin Irwin
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace the 60 GB hard drive in my older model PS3 (fat version). Very easy to install; took less than three minutes. I've noticed no differences in performance compared to the console's stock drive. Just make sure you have your game saves backed up before you make your upgrade.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Gunnar Nettleship
Reviews.Content: I like it. It works. I had no other expectations than it simply working and continuing to work. I guess I could talk about the speed. That seems fine too. It is not any faster than my last hard-drive, but hey, that one was good until my Mom dropped my computer.

Reviews.Title: HARD DRIVE
Reviews.Author: VB Fan
Reviews.Content: I selected this drive for installation in my security system.  Works great, plenty of space for recording and storing data.

Reviews.Title: not all that great
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: for some odd reason, my laptop will not let Windows install on this stupid hard drive.  Will save it for an archives drive or maybe install Linux on it.
